ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Bad Order/Mechanical Inspection Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Inspection/Bad Order/Empty Rejects') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR( ISBLANK(NS_ETAToRepair__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete ETA to Repair prior to closing the Case.
